snippet: With help from her stepfather, Kaleena Mosqueda-Lewis, who matched Connecticut’s record for 3-pointers, began when she was young to work toward a goal of taking 500 shots per day.
abstract: Connecticut women's forward Kaleena Mosqueda-Lewis hits three 3-pointers in a 98-60 win over Tulsa to match Diana Taurasi’s team career record of 318; Mosqueda-Lewis credits years of practice for feat.
lead_paragraph: With help from her stepfather, Kaleena Mosqueda-Lewis, who matched Connecticut’s record for 3-pointers, began when she was young to work toward a goal of taking 500 shots per day.

headline.seo: Kaleena Mosqueda-Lewis of UConn Took Aim at Record for 3-Pointers
headline.main: Years of Repetition Help Sharpshooter Equal a Record
headline.print_headline: Years of Repetition Help Sharpshooter Equal a Record
